title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully register with valid and complete information.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid user information including username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm the registration is successful and the user is redirected to the profile completion page.

title: User Registration Failure with Missing Fields
description: Verify that the registration fails when required fields are missing.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Leave required fields such as email or password empty.
Attempt to submit the registration form.
Verify appropriate validation messages are displayed and registration is not processed.

title: User Login Success
description: Verify existing users can log in successfully with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify the user is authenticated and navigated to the dashboard or home page.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails when incorrect username or password is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Confirm login is denied and an appropriate error message is displayed.

title: Publish Demand Successfully
description: Verify that users can publish a new help demand with valid details in one step.

steps.description: Log in to the platform.
Navigate to the new demand publishing page.
Fill the demand form with valid inputs including description, tags, location, and urgency.
Submit the demand.
Confirm the demand is stored and visible in the mutual aid plaza.

title: Publish Service Successfully
description: Verify users can publish a service offering with valid inputs.

steps.description: Log in to the platform.
Navigate to the new service publishing page.
Fill the service form with valid inputs such as service description, tags, location.
Submit the service.
Verify the service is stored and appears correctly in the mutual aid plaza.

title: Smart Match Correctness
description: Verify that the intelligent matching algorithm returns appropriate neighbor recommendations based on location, tags, and urgency.

steps.description: Publish a demand with specific tags, location, and urgent level.
Trigger the matching process or navigate to matched results.
Validate that recommended users/services have matching tags, are geographically nearby, and prioritized by urgency.

title: Real-time Chat Message Transmission
description: Verify users can send and receive messages instantly in real-time conversation.

steps.description: User A initiates a chat with User B.
User A sends a text message.
User B receives the message instantly on the chat interface.
User B replies with a message.
User A receives the reply instantly.

title: Trust Mechanism in Real-time Chat
description: Verify the trust mechanism restricts or permits information exchange appropriately within the chat.

steps.description: Establish a new chat between two users with no prior trust.
Attempt to share contact information or sensitive data.
Verify restrictions or prompts appear according to trust policy.
Simulate trust approval or verification step.
Confirm users can share contact information post trust establishment.

title: User Profile Update
description: Verify users can update their personal information and skills tags successfully.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to user profile page.
Modify personal details and add or remove skill tags.
Save the changes.
Verify the updated information is persisted and reflected in the profile.

title: Mutual Aid Plaza Browsing and Filtering
description: Verify users can view and filter all posted demands and services in the mutual aid plaza.

steps.description: Navigate to the mutual aid plaza page.
Observe the list/grid of all demands and services.
Apply filters by tags, location, or urgency.
Confirm the displayed results respect filter criteria and pagination if present.

title: Bottom Navigation Bar Functionality
description: Verify that the bottom navigation bar allows users to navigate between main pages smoothly on mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the application on a mobile viewport.
Use the bottom navigation buttons to switch between pages such as home, mutual aid plaza, profile.
Verify that each button click results in correct page navigation without errors or delays.

title: Accessibility Compliance for Key Pages
description: Verify the platform supports ARIA tags, keyboard navigation, and screen reader compatibility on critical pages such as login, demand publishing, and mutual aid plaza.

steps.description: Navigate to each critical page.
Use keyboard only to navigate all interactive elements.
Ensure all controls are reachable and functional via keyboard.
Inspect the DOM to verify correct ARIA attributes are present.

title: Responsive Design on Multiple Screen Sizes
description: Verify the application layout adapts correctly on various screen sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open the application on different device simulations or browser resized windows.
Confirm all UI elements adjust gracefully without overlapping or becoming inaccessible.

title: API and Database Operations Validity
description: Verify that RESTful APIs respond with correct data and status codes during normal and edge case scenarios, and that database operations via Prisma ORM complete without errors.

steps.description: Invoke various API endpoints with valid and invalid inputs.
Validate API responses have expected status codes and data structures.
Check database entries for correct creation, updates, and deletions.

title: Link Check Functionality
description: Verify the link check feature detects usability and accessibility of all interactive links across pages and produces accurate detailed reports.

steps.description: Run the link check tool on all main pages.
Ensure all valid links are confirmed accessible.
Verify broken or problematic links are caught and reported.
Confirm accessibility issues like missing ARIA labels or keyboard unreachable links are flagged.

title: Health Check API Stability
description: Verify that the system health check endpoint returns successful status and current system health metrics under normal and simulated load conditions.

steps.description: Send requests to the health check API endpoint.
Confirm the response indicates system is up, with correct status and health details.
Simulate service stress or failures and resend health check requests.
Verify health API reflects degraded service status appropriately.

title: User Demand and Service Status Management
description: Verify users can activate, deactivate, or pause their published demands and services and see updated status immediately.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to user demands and services management page.
Toggle status of published demand or service between active and paused.
Confirm changes are saved and reflected in the mutual aid plaza and user profile.

title: Edge Case: Publish Demand with Extremely Long Description
description: Verify the system handles extremely long text input in demand publishing gracefully without crashes or data loss.

steps.description: Navigate to demand publishing form.
Input an extremely long demand description exceeding typical limits.
Submit the demand.
Verify system either accepts with truncation or displays appropriate error without crashing.

title: Edge Case: Simultaneous Real-time Messaging
description: Verify the real-time chat system handles multiple simultaneous message sends from different users without data loss or duplication.

steps.description: Set up two or more users in a chat session.
Simultaneously send multiple messages from each user.
Confirm all messages are delivered, displayed in correct order, and no duplicates occur.
